00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A dose scoring ausgab object for beampp: Allows the user to score dose in
00031 #  specified CMs on a region-by-region and/or medium-by-medium basis. Volumes
00032 #  of all regions are assumed to be 1 cm^3 unless explicitly specified by the
00033 #  user.
00034 #
00035 ###############################################################################
00036 */
00037 
00038 
00044 #include <fstream>
00045 #include <string>
00046 
00047 #include "beam_dose_scoring.h"
00048 #include "egs_input.h"
00049 #include "egs_functions.h"
00050 
00051 BEAM_DoseScoring::BEAM_DoseScoring(const string &Name,
00052                                        EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00053     EGS_AusgabObject(Name,f), nreg(0), m_lastCase(-1), nmedia(0),
00054     dose(0), doseM(0), max_dreg(-1), max_medl(0),
00055     score_medium_dose(false), score_region_dose(false)
00056 {
00057     otype = "BEAM_DoseScoring";
00058 }
00059 
00060 BEAM_DoseScoring::~BEAM_DoseScoring() {
00061     if( dose ) delete dose;
00062     if( doseM ) delete doseM;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void BEAM_DoseScoring::setApplication(EGS_Application *App) {
00066 
00067     app=App;
00068     bapp = dynamic_cast<BEAMpp_Application*>(app);
00069     if( !bapp ) return;
00070     // Get the number of regions in the geometry.
00071     nreg = app->getnRegions();
00072     // Get the number of media in the input file
00073     nmedia = app->getnMedia();
00074     // Get list of regions for which to score dose;
00075     int d_start,d_end;
00076     // first, clear the array of media indices in the dose CMs
00077     for(int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00078        vector <int> med_ind;
00079        for(int j=0; j<nmedia; j++) {
00080           med_ind.push_back(-1);
00081        }
00082        cm_med.push_back(med_ind);
00083     }
00084     for(int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00085        if (d_cms[i]==0) d_start = 0;
00086        else d_start = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]-1)+1;
00087        d_end = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]);
00088        for(int j=d_start; j<=d_end; j++) {
00089         //note we need to use IsRegionReal instead of isRealRegion because
00090         //the latter registers virtual regions as real in beampp
00091         if(bapp->IsRegionReal(j)) {
00092             d_region.push_back(j);
00093             cm_med[i][app->getMedium(j)]=1;
00094         }
00095        }
00096     }
00097     // determine maximum medium name length
00098     char buf[32]; int count = 0;int imed=0;
00099     for ( imed=0; imed < nmedia; imed++){
00100       sprintf(buf,"%s%n",app->getMediumName(imed),&count);
00101       if (count > max_medl) max_medl = count;
00102     }
00103     // Flag dose scoring regions in geometry
00104     // and set their volume.
00105     if (d_region.size()){// specific dose regions provided
00106        // Get maximum dose scoring region
00107        for (vector<int>::iterator it = d_region.begin(); it < d_region.end(); it++){
00108            if (*it > max_dreg) max_dreg = *it;
00109        }
00110        for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++){
00111            d_reg_index.push_back(-1);
00112            d_reg_cm_ind.push_back(-1);
00113            vol.push_back(1.0);// set to 1.0
00114        }
00115        for (int i=0; i<d_region.size(); i++){
00116            d_reg_index[d_region[i]]=i;
00117            if (d_region[i] < vol_list.size()) //check to make sure we won't exceed array size
00118               vol[d_region[i]] = vol_list[d_region[i]];
00119            for(int j=0; j<d_cms.size(); j++) {
00120               if(d_region[i]<=bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[j])){
00121                  d_reg_cm_ind[d_region[i]]=j;
00122                  break;
00123               }
00124            }
00125        }
00126        if (score_region_dose) dose = new EGS_ScoringArray(d_region.size());
00127     }
00128     // If requested request memory for medium dose in each CM
00129     if (score_medium_dose) doseM =  new EGS_ScoringArray(nmedia*d_cms.size());
00130 
00131     description = "\n*******************************************\n";
00132     description +=  "BEAM Dose Scoring Object (";
00133     description += name; description += ")\n";
00134     description += "*******************************************\n";
00135     description +="\n Dose will be calculated in CM no.'s (start region - end region):\n";
00136     for (int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00137       if(d_cms[i]==0) sprintf(buf,"%d (0 - %d)\n",d_cms[i],bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]));
00138       else sprintf(buf,"%d (%d - %d)\n",d_cms[i],bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]-1)+1,bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]));
00139       description += buf;
00140     }
00141     description += "\n";
00142     if (dose) description += " - Region dose will be calculated\n";
00143     if (doseM) description += " - Medium dose will be calculated\n";
00144     description += "\n--------------------------------------\n";
00145     sprintf(buf,"%*s %*s rho/[g/cm**3]\n",max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ");description += buf;
00146     description += "--------------------------------------\n";
00147     for ( imed=0; imed < nmedia; imed++){
00148       sprintf(buf,"%-*s",max_medl,app->getMediumName(imed));description += buf;description += " ";
00149       sprintf(buf,"%5.2f",app->getMediumRho(imed));description += buf;description += "\n";
00150     }
00151     description += "\n*******************************************\n\n";
00152     if (d_region.size()) d_region.clear();
00153 }
00154 
00155 void BEAM_DoseScoring::reportResults() {
00156     egsInformation("\n======================================================\n");
00157     egsInformation("BEAM Dose Scoring Object(%s)\n",name.c_str());
00158     egsInformation("======================================================\n");
00159     EGS_Float normD = 1., normE=1.;
00160     int count = 0;
00161     EGS_Float F = app->getFluence();
00162     egsInformation("=> last case = %lld fluence = %g\n", m_lastCase, F);
00163     /* Normalize to actual source fluence */
00164     egsInformation("\n Dose output for CM no.'s:\n");
00165     for(int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00166       egsInformation(" %d \n",d_cms[i]);
00167     }
00168     normE = m_lastCase/F; normD = 1.602e-10*normE;
00169     int irmax_digits = getDigits(max_dreg);
00170     string line; double r,dr;
00171     if (dose){
00172         if (normE==1){
00173            egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of region dosimetry (per particle)\n");
00174            egsInformation(
00175            "CM %-*s %-*s %-*s rho/[g/cm3]  V/cm3      Edep/[MeV]              D/[Gy]            %n\n",
00176            irmax_digits,"ir",irmax_digits,"CM reg.",max_medl,"medium",&count);
00177         }
00178         else{
00179            egsInformation("\n==> Summary of region dosimetry (per fluence)\n");
00180            egsInformation(
00181            "CM %-*s %-*s %-*s rho/[g/cm3]  V/cm3    Edep/[MeV*cm2]            D/[Gy*cm2]         %n\n",
00182            irmax_digits,"ir",irmax_digits,"CM reg.",max_medl,"medium",&count);
00183         }
00184         line.append(count,'-'); egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00185         /* Compute deposited energy and dose */
00186       int ir_cm,fr_cm;
00187       for(int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00188         if(d_cms[i]==0) ir_cm=0;
00189         else ir_cm = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]-1)+1;
00190         fr_cm = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]);
00191         for (int ireg = ir_cm; ireg <= fr_cm; ireg++) {
00192           if (d_reg_index[ireg]>=0){
00193             if (!(app->isRealRegion(ireg))) continue;
00194             int imed = app->getMedium(ireg);
00195             EGS_Float rho = app->getMediumRho(imed);
00196             EGS_Float mass = vol[ireg]*rho;
00197             dose->currentResult(d_reg_index[ireg],r,dr);if( r > 0 ) dr = dr/r; else dr=1;
00198             egsInformation("%-2d %-*d %-*d %-*s %7.3f   %7.3f  %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%  %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%\n",
00199             d_cms[i],max(irmax_digits,2),ireg,max(irmax_digits,7),ireg-ir_cm,max_medl,app->getMediumName(imed),rho,vol[ireg],r*normE,dr*100.,r*normD/mass,dr*100.);
00200           }
00201         }
00202         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00203       }
00204     }
00205     if (doseM){
00206         vector<EGS_Float> massM(d_cms.size()*nmedia,0); int imed = 0;
00207         for (int ir=0; ir<nreg; ir++){
00208          if(d_reg_index[ir]>=0) {
00209           imed = app->getMedium(ir);
00210           massM[imed+d_reg_cm_ind[ir]*nmedia] += app->getMediumRho(imed)*vol[ir];
00211          }
00212         }
00213         if (normE==1){
00214           egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of media dosimetry (per particle)\n");
00215           egsInformation(
00216           "CM %*s %*s     Edep/[MeV]              D/[Gy]            %n\n",
00217           max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00218         }
00219         else{
00220           egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of media dosimetry (per fluence)\n");
00221           egsInformation(
00222           "CM %*s %*s     Edep/[MeV*cm2]              D/[Gy*cm2]            %n\n",
00223           max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00224         }
00225         line="";line.append(count,'-'); egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00226         /* Compute deposited energy in medium (MeV)*/
00227       for(int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00228         for (int im=0; im<nmedia; im++) {
00229             doseM->currentResult(im+i*nmedia,r,dr);
00230             if( cm_med[i][im] >= 0 ){
00231               if( r > 0) dr = dr/r; else dr=1;
00232               egsInformation(
00233               "%-2d %-*s %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%% %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%\n",
00234               d_cms[i],max_medl,app->getMediumName(im),r*normE,dr*100.,r*normD/massM[im+i*nmedia],dr*100.);
00235             }
00236         }
00237         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00238       }
00239     }
00240     egsInformation("\n======================================================\n");
00241 }

00243 bool BEAM_DoseScoring::storeState(ostream &data) const {
00244   //egsInformation("Storing BEAM_DoseScoring...\n");
00245   if( !egsStoreI64(data,m_lastCase)) return false;
00246   data << endl;
00247   if( dose  && !dose->storeState(data))  return false;
00248   if( doseM && !doseM->storeState(data)) return false;
00249   return true;
00250 }
00251 
00252 bool  BEAM_DoseScoring::setState(istream &data){
00253   if( !egsGetI64(data,m_lastCase) ) return false;
00254   if( dose  && !dose->setState(data))  return false;
00255   if( doseM && !doseM->setState(data)) return false;
00256   return true;
00257 }
00258 
00259 bool  BEAM_DoseScoring::addState(istream &data){
00260       int err = addTheStates(data);
00261       if (err){
00262         egsInformation("Error code: %d",err);
00263         return false;
00264       }
00265       return true;
00266 }
00267 
00268 int  BEAM_DoseScoring::addTheStates(istream &data){
00269    EGS_I64 tmp_case; if( !egsGetI64(data,tmp_case) ) return 4401;
00270    m_lastCase += tmp_case;
00271    if (dose){
00272         EGS_ScoringArray tmp(nreg);
00273         if( !tmp.setState(data) ) return 4402;
00274         (*dose) += tmp;
00275    }
00276    if (doseM){
00277      EGS_ScoringArray tmpM(nmedia);
00278      if( !tmpM.setState(data) ) return 4403;
00279      (*doseM) += tmpM;
00280    }
00281    return 0;
00282 }
00283 
00284 void BEAM_DoseScoring::resetCounter(){
00285   m_lastCase = 0;
00286   if (dose)  dose->reset();
00287   if (doseM) doseM->reset();
00288 }

00290 
00291 extern "C" {
00292 
00293 BEAM_DOSE_SCORING_EXPORT EGS_AusgabObject* createAusgabObject(EGS_Input *input,
00294         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00295     const static char *func = "createAusgabObject(beam_dose_scoring)";
00296     if( !input ) {
00297         egsWarning("%s: null input?\n",func); return 0;
00298     }
00299     /* get CMs to score dose in */
00300     vector <int> d_cms;
00301     int err1=input->getInput("dose CMs",d_cms);
00302     if(err1) {
00303         egsWarning("%s: No CMs input.  Dose will not be scored.\n",func); return 0;
00304     }
00305     /* get dose scoring mode: region dose, medium dose or both */
00306     vector<string> allowed_mode;
00307     allowed_mode.push_back("no");allowed_mode.push_back("yes");
00308     int d_in_medium = input->getInput("medium dose",allowed_mode,0);
00309     int d_in_region = input->getInput("region dose",allowed_mode,1);
00310     if(d_in_medium == 0 && d_in_region == 0) {
00311         egsWarning("%s: Neither dose in regions nor dose in medium specified.  Dose will not be scored.\n",func); return 0;
00312     }
00313     vector <int> vreg_start,vreg_stop;
00314     vector <EGS_Float> v_in,volin;
00315     //give the user the option to input volumes of regions if they know them
00316     int err2 = input->getInput("start volume region",vreg_start);
00317     int err3 = input->getInput("stop volume region",vreg_stop);
00318     int err4 = input->getInput("volume",v_in);
00319     if(err4) {
00320        egsWarning("%s: No dose zone volumes input.  Will assume 1 cm^3 for all regions.\n",func);
00321     }
00322     else {
00323       if(!err2 && !err3) {
00324        if(vreg_start.size()==vreg_stop.size()) {
00325          if(v_in.size()<vreg_start.size()) {
00326            egsWarning("%s: No volumes input for region groups %d to %d.\n Will use last input volume for remaining groups.\n",func,v_in.size()+1,vreg_start.size());
00327            for(int i=v_in.size()+1; i<vreg_start.size(); i++) v_in.push_back(v_in[v_in.size()-1]);
00328          }
00329          for(int i=0; i<vreg_start.size(); i++) {
00330            if(volin.size()<=vreg_stop[i]) {
00331             //enlarge to volin array
00332             for(int j=volin.size(); j<=vreg_stop[i]; j++) volin.push_back(1.0);
00333            }
00334            for(int j=vreg_start[i]; j<=vreg_stop[i]; j++) volin[j]=v_in[i];
00335          }
00336        }
00337        else {
00338          egsWarning("%s: Unequal number of start and stop regions.  Will assume 1 cm^3 for all regions.\n",func);
00339        }
00340      }
00341     }
00342     //=================================================
00343 
00344     /* Setup dose scoring object with input parameters */
00345     BEAM_DoseScoring *result = new BEAM_DoseScoring("",f);
00346     if(volin.size()) result->setVol(volin);
00347     else result->setVol(1.0);
00348     result->setDoseCMs(d_cms);
00349     if ( d_in_medium ) result->setMediumScoring(true);
00350     if ( d_in_region ) result->setRegionScoring(true);
00351     result->setName(input);
00352     return result;
00353 }
00354 
00355 }
